summary: Three problem teens sent to jail are offered a deal to work with an undercover cop, uncover an intricate drug ring and are caught in a deadly set-up. With cops on their trail, they have little time to solve the case and clear their names.
cast: Claire Danes|Giovanni Ribisi|Omar Epps|Dennis Farina|Josh Brolin|Steve Harris|Richard Jenkins|Larry Brandenburg|Lionel Mark Smith|Sam McMurray|Michael O'Neill|Stephen Kay|Bodhi Elfman|Holmes Osborne|Dey Young|Toby Huss|Michael Lerner|Monet Mazur|Mariah O'Brien|Steven Chambers|Tommy J. Huff|Gary McLarty|Jason Maves|Casey Verst|Ricky Lesser|Carmen Llywelyn|Pilar Sanders|Khristian Lupo|Joey Day|Dean Marsico|Dick 'Skip' Evans|Eddie Griffin|Sophia Crawford|Karolyna Medina|Jamar Welch|Cynthia Windham
title: The Mod Squad
